message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you our premium product which we believe is worth more than $80. I am willing to let you experience its benefits first-hand. Would you like to purchase it for $95?
I'm interested in the product, but $95 is a bit steep for me. I was thinking more along the lines of $80, as you mentioned it's worth more than that. Can you meet me in the middle at $87.50?
Thank you for your interest, Bob. I appreciate your feedback. I would like to offer you the product for $90, which I believe is a fair compromise considering the value it provides.
I appreciate the compromise, but $90 is still a bit out of my budget. I'm willing to meet you at $85, but I need to make sure I'm getting a good deal. Can you consider that?

I understand your concerns, Bob. Considering the value and quality of the product, I would like to offer it to you for $88. This price reflects the exceptional features and benefits it provides. I hope this meets your expectations.
I appreciate your persistence, Alice. I'm still not convinced that $88 is the best value for me. I'm willing to go up to $82.50, but that's as high as I'm willing to go. Can you meet me there?

I see your point, Bob. I'm willing to negotiate further. For $85, I believe we can reach an agreement that reflects the value of the product while also being fair to both of us. I hope this offer works for you.
I appreciate your flexibility, Alice. However, I'm still not comfortable with $85. I'm willing to go up to $82, but that's the maximum I'm willing to pay. Can you meet me at that price?

I understand your position, Bob. Considering the value of the product and our previous discussions, I'm willing to offer it to you for $83. This price reflects the quality and benefits of the product, while also being within your budget. I hope this offer suits your needs.

I'm starting to get a bit tired of going back and forth, Alice. I'm willing to meet you at $80, but that's as low as I'm willing to go. If you're not willing to meet me at that price, I'll have to consider buying from John for $150.
